definition: to roll/(to do sth) in a loop/to scroll (computing)/to progressively expand (economics)/to rumble (of thunder)
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: You swipe up and down to scroll lists of, say, tracks or artists.
sentences.chinese: 你可以上下滑动来滚动列表，比如，艺术家列表。

sentences.english: Rolling code for anti-lost its ultra-thin compact allows you to ease, handy.
sentences.chinese: 滚动码防丢器其小巧超薄让您轻松自如，得心应手。

sentences.english: Scroll down to read about the latest update, or just click here.
sentences.chinese: 滚动鼠标向下，阅读最新的更新，或者点击这里。

sentences.english: This clothes washer was meant to be used in areas where water is scarce and electricity isn’t available.
sentences.chinese: 这种滚动式的洗衣机适用于缺水少电的地区。

sentences.english: So this is the condition for pure roll.
The rubble was moving. It was pressing down, slowly crushing them.
sentences.chinese: 瓦砾还在不断地向下滚动，碾压着他们的身体。

sentences.english: Use the carbon black with low rolling resistance and the silica.
sentences.chinese: 在胎面胶中使用白炭黑和低滚动阻力炭黑。

sentences.english: Kids will enjoy rolling the fondant on the work mat with the rolling pin.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们将享受滚动达特的工作与垫擀面杖。

sentences.english: It provides the testing program of planar bearing rolling friction.
sentences.chinese: 给出了平面轴承滚动摩擦试验方案。

sentences.english: The plane rolled left and then rolled right. Then he caught an edge of his wing on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飞机时而向左时而向右滚动，最终机翼触地。

sentences.english: A principle of self-position meshing track for conveyer chain has been proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了跟踪运输链节的“滚动啮合自位跟踪”原理。

sentences.english: Other options can be scrolled into view by swiping a finger across the screen.
sentences.chinese: 还可以通过手指滚动屏幕调出更多选项。

sentences.english: His Adam's apple bobbed in his throat.
sentences.chinese: 他的喉结在喉咙里上下滚动。

sentences.english: He rolls between two big trees.
sentences.chinese: 他在两棵大树之间滚动。

sentences.english: Older programs may still have the traditional scroll bar.
sentences.chinese: 其他程序可能仍然有传统的滚动条。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to flip over/to turn (a page)/to scroll (an electronic document)/to stir (food in a pot etc)/to move things about/to rummage
to make a round trip/return journey/back and forth/to and fro/repeatedly
